items.sentence: Tom said that he was going to go camping next weekend.
I still think we should\'ve invited Tom to go with us.
Tom said he was looking for someone who speaks French.
The policeman handcuffed Tom\'s hands behind his back.
The problem is that Tom thinks he\'s better than Mary.
Tom is the only one in our class who can speak French.
How come you never told me you couldn\'t speak French?
How did you find out that Tom didn\'t like doing that?
How did you find out that Tom didn\'t want to do that?
How did you know Tom and Mary weren\'t really married?
